feed.title: Dittofeed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.15.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • onboard user create if doesn't exist by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/973
  • child workspaces by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/974
  • ensure free solo on event entry journey by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/975
  • Fix event trigger sync by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/976
  • add sdk to submitting user events section by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/978
  • update docs to reference app.dittofeed subdomain by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/977
  • add admin get endpoints by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/979
  • remove join operation from windowed perform segments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/980
  • within trait segment efficiency by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/981
  • disable callback from sms test by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/982
  • lint fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/983
  • compute state efficiency by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/984
  • hasbeen segment efficiency by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/985
  • parallelize segment and user property compute assignments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/986
  • streamline segments compute properties by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/987
  • ensure computed property tests order assertions by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/988
  • update sdk-web version by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/989
  • restructure public logs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/992

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.14.0...v0.15.0

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.16.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • webhook broadcasts fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/998
  • abstract app entry by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/999
  • get workspace id validation by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1000
  • additional validations for workspace id in api request context by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1001
  • remove dup logic for workspace id resolution by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1002
  • abstract out admin api auth by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1003
  • individual delivery method by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1005
  • configure individual message provider by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1006
  • external id workspaces by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1007
  • pass message tags to template renderer by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1008
  • handle missing single delivery by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1009
  • inherit parent workspace email/sms provider by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1010
  • gte and lt trait segment operators by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1011
  • performed numeric operators by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1012
  • process assignments concurrency limit by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1013
  • remove unused code by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1014
  • add context to webhook events by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1015
  • improved error handling ses webhook by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1016
  • fix regression in styling of email preview body in deliveries table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1017
  • explicitly pass pino pretty stream by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1018
  • filter out Null values when calculating AnyOf user properties by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1019
  • correct anyOf fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1020
  • fix error logging for ses by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1021
  • email template custom headers by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1022
  • ses hook fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1023
  • correct tag schema for ses by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1024
  • correct type error with ses schema change by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1025
  • fix submitted ses event structure by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1026
  • fix resource delete requests by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1027
  • more ses logging by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1028

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.15.0...v0.16.0

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.17.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • upgrade tags to v0.16.0 by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1029
  • separate user pages by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1030
  • APP_VERSION env var by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1031
  • fix admin-cli appVersion by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1032
  • expose subscription group controller via admin by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1034
  • add subscription group admin controller api json by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1037
  • retrieved attribute by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1036
  • test when a segment is defined post relevant event by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1035
  • enable name sorting in resource table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1038
  • improve visibility for process assignments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1039
  • revert process ordering change by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1040
  • more process assignments span tags by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1041
  • computed property version tag by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1042
  • remove upper bound on process assignments step by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1043
  • move pagination in process assignments statement by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1044
  • external id bootstrap postgres by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1046
  • fix reversed ordering on parent child workspace auth by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1047

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.16.0...v0.17.0
